name: R1 Games 64
description:
Enjoy a game of minigames in low resolution, but high entertainment

I couldn't make a game I did four

The minigames contain:
Chariots, Rockets, Balls and Ghosts.

What more can you ask?

Programmed by: Reinier Tocuyo (R1 Tocuyo) https://twitter.com/R1_Tocuyo
Music & sound fx by: Carlos Morales (Zismo) https://zismomusik.itch.io/
